value.title: DAX Fridays! #46:  What is the difference between calculated column and measure in Power BI?

value.title: DAX Fridays! #: 75: SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the DAX function called SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR.  This little function is great for analyzing as the function itself says, the same period last year.  If you have seasonal business and you want to analyze what happended the same period the previous year, it will do it flowless.

value.title: DAX Fridays! #79: KEEPFILTERS
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going through the DAX function KEEPFILTERS. KEEPFILTERS will remove the behaviour that CALCULATE has where it removes the filters available. value.title: DAX Fridays! #82: How to learn DAX for beginners

value.title: DAX Fridays! #95: Binning, Frequency and relative frequency | Data profiler
value.excerpt: This is the first of a series of videos about data profiling and descriptive statistics. value.title: After Union Two tables, data goes to the wrong column with Power BI DAX?
value.excerpt: Most of us have used Union DAX expression in Power BI. Basically union, appends rows from both the table which are common. value.title: DAX Beginners - SUM Vs SUMX in Power BI - What, When and Where?
